name: HIV/AIDS
description: HIV is a virus that attacks the body's immune system, leading to AIDS if untreated.

name: Gonorrhea
symptoms: Pain or burning sensation during urination
description: Gonorrhea is a sexually transmitted bacterial infection that, if untreated, may cause infertility and other complications.

name: Hepatitis C
symptoms: Jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes)
description: Hepatitis C is a liver infection caused by the hepatitis C virus.

name: Herpes
symptoms: Painful sores or blisters on the genital or anal area
description: Herpes is a common sexually transmitted infection caused by the herpes simplex virus (HSV).

name: Chlamydia
symptoms: Pain or burning sensation during urination
description: Chlamydia is a common sexually transmitted infection caused by the bacterium Chlamydia trachomatis.

name: Syphilis
symptoms: Rash on the palms of the hands or soles of the feet
description: Syphilis is a bacterial infection usually spread by sexual contact. The disease starts as a painless sore â€” typically on your genitals, rectum or mouth.

name: Hepatitis B
symptoms: Jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes)
description: Hepatitis B is a viral infection that attacks the liver and can cause both acute and chronic disease.
